storyInfo: Zofia arrives at the bar after a while and is surprised to learn Maria's next opponent. At the same time, the incredible strength of the Left-hand Knight leaves Maria in a desperate situation.

attributes.content: The previous Platinum harbored a secret love for his target, and so for the sake of protecting the object of his affections, he died at the Armorless Union's hands.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: As a result, the girl of today was pushed hastily into the position, our 'youngest Platinum.'
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...She is a gifted mark, make no joke, and I must say her strong potential makes her unignorably suited for the role... but in all other respects, she is far and away one of the least mature to ever assume the position.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I-I see... Why are you telling me this? The Armorless Union's existence should be classified... so aren't you...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Oh, do lay your concerns aside. It's simply been on my mind quite a bit as of late. Had I not made the effort to get to where I am today, I would hardly enjoy the privilege to ponder it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Did you know? Our present Platinum was elected to the position by the very Platinum before her, doomed to die as he was.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: A great deal of food for thought... Not to mention why the Armorless Union would listen to a traitor, to say nothing of how electing this girl would have absolutely no impact on his own death sentence. For what reason did he do this?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Before the arrow of his own colleague shot through his chest, did he think to cry out? To whom? Of what? To what end? Would it have been that easy?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: If I remember correctly, you a Słoma employee, correct?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Y-Yeah... so far in the event, I've been responsible for liaising between the major companies and the Knights Association...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Errand work takes quite the toll.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: It's no problem. If I can contribute to the business, that's what I'm here for—
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: No no no, your work is what they pay your salary for. You needn't use such humble language.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: You apparently had your own business before. What made you abandon it?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Ah... I didn't have what it took...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: What distinguishes failure and success may be more than ability. Perhaps you have chosen the wrong path to walk, or perhaps you walk as I do now.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: P-People like me only...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: In Kazimierz, anything is possible.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Zofia... feels like an age since I saw you.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Oh, Marcin...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Have you seen Maria?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Something cropped up. Had her head back home.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I see—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —I smell blood. Hold on. What are these bandages?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Has Maria been hurt? Who was she fighting? What happened?!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I told her not to be rash! Why doesn't this silly girl—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Steady, now. It's some other kid who got hurt.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...What happened?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Someone went for the Ashlock and Flametail Knights out of nowhere... Ashlock got injured, and by a mighty stroke of something, they ended up in here.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: This morning, they said they didn't want to cause Nearl any more trouble and left.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Do things like that just happen?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: They're in a hell of a tight spot, but our hands are tied.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Seen the news this morning?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: What's Maria doing now?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Competing.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Competing in what? Against who?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Unguarded one-on-one, just like with Ingra. Head to head.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Against 'Left-hand' Tytus Topola.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hold on—who?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Blade Helmet Knightclub commander. Noble knight, big commercial name, been as far as the Final 16. Tytus Topola.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: But... But there should be no way Maria gets matched against him at her point level, and his social standing is...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Someone came looking for Maria. It wasn't good.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: She's just like Margaret used to be. Obsessed with charging forward, no idea how to deal with the corporates.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: You think... she's like Margaret?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Margaret KNEW what she was doing. Maria only got like this after falling for her own wishful thinking about her own ideals.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: She's not even clear what's in front of her, and she doesn't know what to do about it. She can't keep pushing upwards like this!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria was so much more carefree before this... She doesn't need to be the kind of knight you and I were, does she?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You might be right, but you need to remember she's got her own mind for things. You can't decide it all for her.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: She's still real young, and uneasy at that. Maybe her being carefree was all just so she wouldn't worry you.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Maria might not come off mature a lot of the time, but what kind of kid without a fighting spirit could overcome the Plastic Knight, come to a draw with Brassrust, hold third place in a melee?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Maybe she ought to lose a match. It'd sober her up.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: If you're telling me that's what you really think.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Which arena is it?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ladiiiiiiies—aaaand gentlemeeeenn! Welcommme, to the Fireblade Arena, and welcome to a very special event today!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: An event already drawing the greatest media attention since the start of the preliminaries! Right at this verrry moment, all twelve imprints of the Rose Paper Union are zeroed in on one arena!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And not just that—whoa, put your hands together now for the Fireblade Arena, the third largest in Kazimierz! Because today! Every single seat has been filled!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Are our opponents today just that popular?! Or is this going to be one seriously major show?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: It's my job to tell you the answer is—booooth!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And I gotta say—what a privilege!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: In today's special event! Our first competitor, hailing from the Nearl family, the mania for her's off the charts! The marvelous maiden knight who's got all her fans talking—Maria Nearl!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: And facing her—! The concealed blade, the height of status, named for the old knight of legend, it's the headliner of the Blade Helmet Knightclub, it's 'Left-hand' Tytus Topola!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ooooh, man! Might be a first, today—the knights haven't even come in yet, but the prize pool is running insane numbers! Looks like I oughta stop running my mouth already—I bet y'all wanted me to stop, right?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I got you! No time to lose! Would our two knights please enter the arena!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: First on the battlefield is Maria Nearl! Just like always, pure white armor! Just like always, a delicate stance!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: After defeating 'Plastic' Szewczyk, she's been marching victorious! Big or small, no matter the event, Maria Nearl brings her A-game!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Standing here now, she declared way back she had to get a place in the Major! Can she use this match as a stepping stone, and rise to the apex of the Kazimierz knights? We're all waiting to see!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (I never did that...)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: And in the other corner—please—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Shut up, motormouthed clown.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Your sort don't deserve to stand in my arena. Get off the stage. Get out.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: —No mistake! That's Tytus Topola! I've been saying forever, we oughta give all our contestants microphones and let the audience immerse themselves in the heat of battle!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This event is joint sponsored by Mieszko Group, Rose Paper Union, Słoma Food Company and the Roar Guards!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The entire audience will get product coupons for goods from the aforementioned companies at any time! And once again, I'm gonna personally recommend a must-have for all you watching the game—Blue Ear Beer!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ...Nearl.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Ugly sight. Struggling to hold onto your family's knighthood. Like a gloompincer out of water.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: With no strength to bear a knight's name, what service will shamelessly lashing out do?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: ...Your words mean nothing to me.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: So they shall. May the last Nearl knight be ruined by my own hand today.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Fear not. I'm a different breed from Ingra's dross... You will know today that not all who bear weapons can be called knights.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I smell gunpowder! Primed and ready to blow—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: I'm done holding you back, so may I have the honor to declare! Let the match—beginnnn!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: —Wh-What just happened?! It was instant! The instant it started! Maria's sword got sent flying! And one swift follow-up kick—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This is a HUGE power imbalance, alright—!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Pick up your sword.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: (It-It hurts...! How does he...!)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Faster.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: (The ułan... extended attack range, and agile, and powerful... and leaves no gaps.)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Again.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: You won't have it your way—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Frail.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Nnfh—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Cleaving... the light?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Is that so hard?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I was thinking I'd rend your sword straight in two, hmph... the Nearl family sword.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: You hold shakily to your faith, but you know nothing true of faith. You are naive—weak—feeble-minded—
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Unworthy to stand before me.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: And again! The Left-hand Knight makes it look easy! He waits for Maria to pick up her weapon, and then deals the next blow!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This is the power of Kazimierz's first-class Knightclub! This is the power of a true Major knight! Pals in the audience here for the first time, don't close your eyes, don't miss a thing!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: 'Cause this brutal battle'll end in a flash!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ungh—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The light—crumbled, ruined, desecrated.
In the shadow of 'Left-hand' Tytus, Maria raises her sword once more.
